import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', service: '', message: '', agreed: false }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; return (
'), url('data:image/svg+xml,'), linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(-45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 25%, transparent 25%) `, backgroundSize: '400px 200px, 300px 300px, 60px 60px, 60px 60px', backgroundPosition: '0 0, 100px 50px, 0 0, 30px 30px', minHeight: '100vh', position: 'relative', overflow: 'hidden' }}>
{/* Left Side - Form */}

CONTACT NOW

Have Question? Write a
Message

We will catch you as early as we receive the message

{/* Right Side - Contact Info */}
{/* Phone Card */}
Phone:

Assistance hours: Monday - Saturday, 11 am to 9 pm

(+91) 88663 92521
{/* Email Card */}
Email:

Our support team will get back to you during standard business hours.

Let's Connect - Click Here
{/* LinkedIn Card */}
LinkedIn:

We are available Monday - Saturday, 24/7

GJTecho.com
{/* Decorative Elements */}
")', backgroundSize: 'contain', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', opacity: 0.8, zIndex: 1 }}>
")', backgroundSize: 'contain', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', opacity: 0.7, zIndex: 1 }}>
")', backgroundSize: 'contain', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', opacity: 0.6, zIndex: 1 }}>
); }; export default Contact;
